prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Bass, Pipe, Guitar, Strings, Drums, Brass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Guitar, Strings, Drums, Brass, Bass, and Pipe are all featured in this song, but Piano is absent.

Style 2: This composition is comprised of Reed, Bass, Pipe, Guitar, Strings, Drums, and Brass, but Piano is not included.

Style 3: This piece of music has Reed, Bass, Pipe, Guitar, Strings, Drums, and Brass, Piano however is not present.
